about_the_game:
Humanity has fallen, becoming cattle for vampires. For every attempt to change this, you pay with the blood of your comrades. ARPG Styria offers unique combat styles for each type of enemy and immerses you in an original world with steampunk vampires. Thoroughly explore the world, killing vampires on your way in search of power.

Exploration

The game offers you to explore 4 truly unique territories:

  • The Dead Lands with their religious plague and fanaticism

  • The war-torn Ashen Plains

  • The utopian steampunk city - Mechanotopia

  • The Human Gardens with terrifying mutations and genetic experiments

Death is just the beginning

The only key to victory is your gift of eternal life. But the price of each attempt is the life of a comrade! Each new body will give you unique features, and along the way, you will unlock additional abilities. By developing the estate, you can get even more prepared bodies of followers.

Combat System

All this is combined with the variability of weapon types and their combinations. You can firmly grasp a sword in one hand and a whip in the other, combining them in battle. Most types of enemies require their own approach in fighting them, study their weaknesses and choose the most effective way to kill.

Styria is a true immersion in the atmosphere of dark and hopeless gothic. We have put our soul into telling you this story and hope you will enjoy it.
